spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The abhorrent overlord's spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 15}). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: The abhorrent overlord can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abhorrent overlord té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abhorrent overlord makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic. The abhorrent overlord regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt if the target is a creature.

action.name: Storm of Crows {@recharge}
entries: The abhorrent overlord conjures a swarm of spectral crows and harpies in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the overlord can see within 120 feet of it. The sphere remains for 1 minute or until the overlord loses concentration (as if concentrating on a spell), and its area is lightly obscured and difficult terrain.

Any creature that moves into the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw. A creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany tallant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Hold the Line
entries: While the hoplite is holding a spear, other creatures provoke an opportunity attack from the hoplite when they move within 5 feet of it. When the hoplite hits a creature with an opportunity attack using its spear, the creature takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant, and the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hoplite makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The alseid's spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 14}). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: The alseid has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide while it is in grassland.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The alseid té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The alseid makes two radiant touch attacks.

action.name: Radiant Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany radiant.

monster.name: Anvilwrought Raptor
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The raptor has advantage on Saviesa (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Recorded Mimicry
entries: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Anvilwrought Raptor Familiar
entries: Some anvilwrought raptors are created expressly to be familiars. Such creatures have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The anvilwrought can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magical, telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the anvilwrought senses, as long as they are within 1 mile of each other.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: If Aphemia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Aphemia té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Aphemia makes two attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Discordant Song
entries: Aphemia shrieks a cacophony of magical sounds. Each humanoid within 120 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of her until the song ends. A {@condition frightened} creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany psíquic at the start of its turn while Aphemia is singing. Una criatura {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Aphemia's Discordant Song for the next 24 hours. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is {@condition incapacitated} or dies.

action.name: Grave Calling Song
entries: Aphemia intones a low, growling magical melody. Every undead within 300 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or fall under her control until the song ends. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing, and she can mentally command the undead under her control as part of the same bonus action. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is {@condition incapacitated} or dies.

monster.name: Arasta

trait.name: Armor of Spiders (Mythic Trait; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: If Arasta is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, she regains 200 hit points. In addition, Arasta's children immediately swarm over her body to protect her, granting her 100 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Arasta fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Arasta té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: Arasta pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Arasta ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Arasta makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany perforant, and the target must make a {@dc 21} Constitució saving throw, taking 32 ({@damage 5d12}) de dany de verí on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. If the damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Web of Hair {@recharge 4}
entries: Arasta unleashes her hair in the form of webbing that fills a 30-foot cube next to her. The web is difficult terrain, its area is lightly obscured, and it lasts for 1 minute. Any creature that moves into the web or that starts its turn there must make a {@dc 21} Destresa saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition restrained} while in the web. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 21} Força check. On a success, it can free itself or a creature within 5 feet of it that is {@condition restrained} by the web. This webbing is immune to all damage except magical fire. A 5-foot cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 20 fire damage from a spell or other magical source on a single turn.

legendary.name: Urpes
entries: Arasta makes one attack with her claws.

legendary.name: Swarm (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Arasta causes two {@creature swarm of spiders||swarms of spiders} to appear in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of her.

legendary.name: Toxic Web (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each creature {@condition restrained} by Arasta's Web of Hair takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí.

mythicHeader: If Arasta's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions, as long as she has temporary hit points from her Armor of Spiders.

mythic.name: Swipe
entries: Arasta makes two attacks with her claws.

mythic.name: Web of Hair (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Arasta recharges Web of Hair and uses it.

mythic.name: Nyx Weave (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature {@condition restrained} by Arasta's Web of Hair must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitució saving throw, or the creature takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de força and any spell of 6th level or lower on it ends.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The archon's spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The archon pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The archon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Mount
entries: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Destresa saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

trait.name: Radiant Rebirth (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points, it regains 30 hit points and springs back to its feet with a burst of radiance. Each creature of the archon's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw, or the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany radiant and is {@condition blinded} until the start of the archon's turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The archon makes two attacks with its radiant spear.

action.name: Radiant Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany radiant.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The archon makes a radiant spear attack or casts guiding bolt.

legendary.name: Coordinated Assault (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The archon makes a radiant spear attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Return to Nyx (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The archon causes a corpse it can see within 30 feet of it to burst into a shower of radiant stars leaving no trace of it behind. Everything it is wearing or carrying remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the corpse when it bursts must succeed on a {@dc 16} Destresa saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany radiant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The ashen rider's spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 18}). The rider pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Aura of Silence
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a {@dc 18} Saviesa saving throw if the rider can see it. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature can't speak and is {@condition deafened} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Mount
entries: If the ashen rider isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the ashen rider and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the ashen rider appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.

While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, the ashen rider can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Destresa saving throws. If the ashen rider is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ashen rider makes three attacks with its ashen blade or two attacks with its bolt of ash.

action.name: Ashen Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Bolt of Ash
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the ashen rider's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The ashen rider makes an attack using its ashen blade or bolt of ash.

legendary.name: Coordinated Assault (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The ashen rider makes an attack using its ashen blade or bolt of ash, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Reduce to Ash (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The ashen rider targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw, or it takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany necròtic and its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. If the target's hit point maximum is reduced to 0, its body and everything it is wearing and carrying, except for magic items, are reduced to ash. A creature reduced to ash can't be revived by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The harpy té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The harpy has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The harpy makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If Antigonos moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Força saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: Antigonos can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Antigonos can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls he makes during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

trait.name: Decrepit State
entries: Antigonos has disadvantage on his attack rolls.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Amphora
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If there is not already a creature inside the amphora, the target is {@condition restrained} inside. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 14} Destresa (Acrobatics) check, escaping from the amphora on a success. The effect also ends if the amphora is destroyed. The amphora has AC 8, 20 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

monster.name: Bronze Sable
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si sable es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal statue.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The sable has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sable's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: Si the sable sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sable makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Burnished Hart
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the hart moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the hart or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The hart has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hart makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

monster.name: Colossus of Akros
languages: understands Common and Celestial but can't speak

trait.name: Crumbling Destruction
entries: When the colossus drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a {@dc 22} Destresa saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany contundent and 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the colossus is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The colossus's són màgics.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The colossus of Akros fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, o 200/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, o 27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the colossus makes a ranged attack with this spear, the spear magically returns to its hand after the attack.

action.name: Espasa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 6d8 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Flames of Akros {@recharge}
entries: Magical flames issue from the colossus toward up to three creatures the colossus can see within 90 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 24} Destresa saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. On a failed save, a target also magically catches fire for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the burning target repeats the saving throw. It takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de foc on a failed save, and the effect ends on a successful one.

trait.name: Aura of Erebos
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the giant must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw, or it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic and can't regain hit points until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the giant's Aura of Erebos for 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The giant té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Noxious Gust {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant exhales a mighty gust that creates a blast of deadly mist in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: The eater of hope can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The eater of hope té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eater of hope makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Breath of Hopelessness {@recharge 5}
entries: The eater of hope exhales a miasma of Underworld winds in a 30-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 14} Carisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany necròtic and is cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target takes an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany necròtic whenever the eater of hope hits it with an attack. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't cursed.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The lion té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el lion es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 14}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el lion pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The lion has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the lion (not an area). If the lion's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the lion and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lion makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Urpa
entries: The lion makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Roar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lion emits a magical roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the lion that can hear the roar must succeed on a {@dc 12} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the lion until the end of the lion's next turn.

monster.name: Flitterstep Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the eidolon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, the eidolon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The eidolon té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eidolon fa dos atacs melé. Immediately before or after one of its attacks, it can use Flitterstep if it is available.

action.name: Flickering Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Flitterstep {@recharge 5}
entries: The eidolon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. If it makes an attack immediately after teleporting, it has advantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Ghostblade Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The eidolon té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eidolon makes two ghostblade attacks.

action.name: Ghostblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de força.

monster.name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the sentinel moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The sentinel has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the sentinel (not an area). If the sentinel's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the sentinel and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sentinel makes two ram attacks.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The sentinel exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 15} Destresa saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hippocamp pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the hippocamp moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The giant can't be surprised.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
entries: The giant adds 5 to its AC against one weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Hythonia

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Hythonia's spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 18}). She can innately cast {@spell animate objects} once per day requiring no material components.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Hythonia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Hythonia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Hythonia can force it to make a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw if she isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, on a failed save the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Hythonia until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Hythonia in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Hythonia sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of her and in an area of bright light, she is affected by her own gaze.

trait.name: Shed Skin (Mythic Trait; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: If Hythonia is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, she sheds her skin, regains 199 hit points, and moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Hythonia makes three attacks: one with her claws, one to constrict, and one with her snaky hair.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and takes 15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany contundent at the start of each of its turns, and Hythonia can't constrict another target.

action.name: Snaky Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) de dany contundent, and Hythonia can pull the target up to 5 feet closer to her if it is a Large or smaller creature.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Hythonia moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Snaky Hair
entries: Hythonia makes one attack with her snaky hair.

legendary.name: Petrified Earth (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Hythonia causes stone spikes to erupt from the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on her. The area becomes difficult terrain until the start of her next turn. Any creature, other than Hythonia, takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant for every 5 feet it moves on those spikes.

mythicHeader: If Hythonia's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Shed Skin.

mythic.name: Numbing Claws
entries: Hythonia makes two attacks with her claws. If both attacks hit the same creature, it takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí and must succeed on a DC 18 Constitució saving throw or become paralyzed until the start of her next turn.

mythic.name: Look at Me (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Hythonia can force a sighted creature she has {@condition grappled} to see her eyes and be affected by her gaze.

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: When the hydra takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of the hydra takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}. Whenever the hydra takes 35 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany perforant.

headerEntries: The lampad's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Corpse Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the lampad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one creature's corpse within its abast and emerge from a second creature's corpse within 60 feet of the first corpse, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second corpse. Both corpses must be Medium or bigger.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The lampad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lampad attacks twice with its necrotic touch or chill touch.

action.name: Necrotic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Chill Touch (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the lampad's next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the lampad until the end of the lampad's next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the leonin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The leonin makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Multi-atac

items.name: Constrènyer

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ray of Frost (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de fred, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hoplite's next turn.

entries: The naiad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic.

entries: Undead creatures within 30 feet of the shepherd gain a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls. When any other creature that isn't undead or a construct starts its turn within 30 feet of the shepherd, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Saviesa saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The shepherd té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent if used with two hands, plus 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Herd the Underworld (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The shepherd pulls twisted souls from the Underworld; {@dice 1d6} {@creature shadow||shadows} (without Sunlight Weakness) arise in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the shepherd. The shadows act right after the shepherd on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the shepherd dies.

trait.name: Carregar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ram té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de força.

entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

entries: When the oread is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of the oread that it can see, the creature that damaged the oread must make a {@dc 14} Destresa saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Gatekeeper's Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the phylaskia must make a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the phylaskia to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the phylaskia drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Vigilant

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The phylaskia makes two longsword attacks and uses its Força Drain once.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, o 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany tallant if used with two hands, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Força Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany necròtic. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, its Força score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Força to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Acidic Blood

trait.name: Hold Breath

Whenever Polukranos takes 40 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, Polukranos dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken 40 or more fire damage since its last turn. Polukranos regains 20 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Wakeful

action.name: Mossegada

action.name: Cua

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Polukranos makes a Saviesa (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Cop de Cua
entries: Polukranos makes a atac de cua.

legendary.name: Trampling Charge (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Polukranos moves up to 50 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature Huge or smaller. The first time it enters each creature's space during this move, it can make a stomp attack against that creature.

entries: If the satyr performs for at least 1 minute, it chooses up to four humanoids within 60 feet of it who watched or listened to the entire performance. entries: The satyr makes two ram attacks or two shortbow attacks.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The satyr té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sleepless Reveler
entries: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hail of Arrows (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 14} Destresa saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany perforant on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Head
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The chimera exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 15} Destresa saving throw, taking 32 ({@damage 5d12}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The triton's spellcasting ability is Carisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The triton pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Summon Water Weird (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons {@dice 1d4} {@creature water weird||water weirds}. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.

action.name: Wave Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Ray of Frost (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de fred, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the triton's next turn.

reaction.name: Frigid Shield
entries: When a creature the triton can see targets the triton with an attack, the triton gains 10 temporary hit points. If the attack hits and reduces the temporary hit points to 0, each creature within 5 feet of the triton takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The triton's spellcasting ability is Saviesa (spell save {@dc 12}). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The triton pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.

action.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Poisoned Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

monster.name: Tromokratis

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Tromokratis pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Tromokratis falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Tromokratis's són màgics.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Tromokratis deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
entries: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Tromokratis makes three attacks: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 26}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle Grasp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 26} per escapar). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target up to 60 feet in a straight line. The target lands {@condition prone} and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitució saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Tromokratis moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Cua
entries: Tromokratis makes one atac de cua.

legendary.name: Bite (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Tromokratis makes one bite attack.

mythicHeader: If Tromokratis's mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Hearts of the Kraken.

mythic.name: Rampage
entries: Tromokratis makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacle grasp.

mythic.name: Coral Growth (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of Tromokratis must make a DC 25 Destresa saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany tallant on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. Until the start of its next turn, Tromokratis and its hearts gain a +2 bonus to AC.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Multiheaded
entries: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 12} Destresa saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the hardening rock. A creature can make a {@dc 12} Força (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within abast from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The typhon té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Ràfega de Mossegades, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

action.name: Ràfega de Mossegades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}35 ({@damage 8d6 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and takes 17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany contundent at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

action.name: Boca
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany d'àcid.

monster.name: Underworld Cerberus
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Multiheaded
entries: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cerberus makes three bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The cerberus exhales a 30-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 15} Destresa saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the hardening rock. A creature can make a {@dc 15} Força (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within abast from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 20 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el lion es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 15}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el lion pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The woe strider's open mouth creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 60-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the woe strider decides which way the cone faces and whether its mouth is open or closed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The woe strider makes two claw attacks and one bite attack. If both claws hit the same creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one creature that is {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic. In addition, each magic item the creature is carrying that isn't an artifact has its magical properties suppressed for 1 minute.
